meanings.sent1: Neuroimagings help doctors see inside the brain to understand how it works.
meanings.sent2: The hospital used neuroimagings to diagnose the patient's brain injury.
meanings.sent3: During the neuroimagings, the brain seemed to smile in the images!

meanings.sent5: The neuroimagings painted a colorful picture of the brain's inner workings.

meanings.definition: The process of obtaining images of the brain using advanced imaging technology.
meanings.sent1: Doctors rely on neuroimagings to capture detailed pictures of the brain.
meanings.sent2: Neuroimagings are essential for studying brain disorders.
meanings.sent3: The neuroimagings decided to take a selfie inside the brain!
